p: Our model showed that present suitable brown bear habitat area was 3,430,493.90Â km 2 in Central Asia (Figure 6). Most of the habitats located in China (65.7%), followed by Mongolia (13.9%), Kazakhstan (5.1%), India (4.1%), Kyrgyzstan (3.5%), and Pakistan (2.0%; Table 3, Figure 6). The least amount of suitable habitat was found in Bhutan (0.4%), Uzbekistan (0.3%), Nepal (1.2%), and Afghanistan (1.4%; Table 3, Figure 6).
